content.webTitle: Film references: the picture of the park

fields.headline: Film references: the picture of the park
fields.bodyText: 1. Red Coat Over Bench - An American Werewolf In London 2. Priest Looking Up By A Lamppost - The Exorcist 3. Child's Frame With Ravens On - The Birds 4. Tricycle - The Shining 5. Couple Carrying Video Recorder - The Blair Witch Project 6. Pterodactyls - Jurassic Park 7. Sculpted T-Rex, Topiary - Edward Scissorhands 8. Boeing Engine Falling To Earth - Donnie Darko 9. Chainsaw - Texas Chainsaw Massacre 10. Red Apple With Bite Out Of It - Snow White 11. Line Of Receiver Dishes - Contact 12. Twister -Twister 13. Bunch Of Red Carnations In A Bin - Jean De Florette 14. Brick Well - The Ring 15. Farmer Walking A Small Pig - Babe 16. Man On Sit-On Mower - The Straight Story 17. 4 Large White Feathers - The 4 Feathers 18. Man On Bench With Bag On Head - The Elephant Man 19. Hand Crawling On A Path - The Evil Dead
